title: NNVCD Bead Tracking System for Patterns
description: System for creating and tracking Beads (records) for identified conflict patterns

bead_definition.purpose: Track recurring conflict patterns or significant deviations as discrete units of analysis

structure.pattern_type: Either Seasonal Escalation or New Conflict Actor or Other Anomaly
structure.linked_event: Reference to the triggering NNVCD report and any historical ACLED events
structure.pattern_id: Inherited from Pattern Matcher output (e.g., SEASONAL_CLASH_PLATEAU_NORTH_CENTRAL)
structure.analysis_summary: Brief description of the pattern or deviation
structure.historical_references: List of related ACLED event IDs and dates if applicable
structure.update_history: Log of updates if pattern evolves over time

storage.format: JSONL file per bead or batch by month

creation_logic.trigger: On Pattern Matcher identifying a pattern or deviation for new report

seasonal_escalation.criteria: Event matches historical precedent in timing and type (similarity > 0.85) AND occurs during known high-conflict period
seasonal_escalation.action: Create bead with pattern_type Seasonal Escalation
seasonal_escalation.example: Violence spike in Kaduna during dry season matching historical farmer-herder clashes

new_conflict_actor.criteria: Event involves actor type not present in historical data for location OR similarity < 0.7 for actor matches
new_conflict_actor.action: Create bead with pattern_type New Conflict Actor
new_conflict_actor.example: Emergence of previously unseen militia in Enugu

other_anomaly.criteria: Event deviates significantly in scale or type without clear actor novelty
other_anomaly.action: Create bead with pattern_type Other Anomaly
other_anomaly.example: Unusually high fatalities for a protest event in Lagos

linking.historical: Link to ACLED events via bead_reference from Pattern Matcher
linking.internal: Cross-reference with other NNVCD beads of same pattern_id

update_policy.active_monitoring: Check new reports against existing beads; update analysis_summary if pattern persists or evolves
update_policy.escalation: Elevate bead status if linked events increase in frequency or severity
update_policy.archiving: Move beads to Archived status if no related events for 12 months

query_interface.access: Allow querying beads by pattern_id, location, or date range
query_interface.output: Return summary of pattern history and linked events

visualization.dashboard_integration: Feed bead data into NNVCD UI for pattern trend visualization
visualization.alerts: Generate alert for new beads tagged as New Conflict Actor or significant escalations

execution.automation: Fully automated creation on Pattern Matcher output
execution.logging: Log all bead creations and updates for audit trail
execution.error_handling: If bead creation fails, log error and retry; fallback to manual entry if persistent issue
